metadata.title: CVE-2017-1000415 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: MatrixSSL version 3.7.2 has an incorrect UTCTime date range validation inits X.509 certificate validation process resulting in some certificateshave their expiration (beginning) year extended (delayed) by 100 years.

criterions.comment: matrixssl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
